text | You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell. If the interrupted spell is 3rd level or lower, it fails and has no effect. If the interrupted spell is 4th level or higher, it fails if you succeed an ability check with your spellcasting ability against a DC of 10 + the spell's level.
text | Automatic success if the interrupted spell is the same level or lower.
title: Counterspell

contents: text | You create 45 pounds of food and 30 gallons of water on the ground or in containers nearby, enough to sustain up to fifteen humanoids or five steeds for 24 hours. The food is bland but nourishing and spoils after 24 hours if uneaten. The water is clean and doesn't go bad.
title: Create Food & Water

contents: property | Components | VSM (one clay pot full of grave dirt, one with brackish water, and an onyx worth 150 gp for each corpse)

text | You can only cast this spell at night. You choose up to three medium or small corpses and turn them into Ghouls under your command. As a bonus action on each turn, issue one command to any/all within 120': specific movement and action, or general command such as "guard this corridor".
text | Undead are controlled for 24 hours. Within that time, re-cast the spell to reassert control over up to 3 ghouls instead of animating new ones.
text | 7th: 4 ghouls. 8th: 5 ghouls or 2 ghasts/wights. 9th: 6 ghouls, 3 ghasts/wights, or 2 mummies.
title: Create Undead

contents: property | Components | VSM (a drop of water if creating water or a few grains of sand if destroying it)
text | Create You create up to 10 gallons of water within range in an open container, or make rain in a 30-foot cube, extinguishing exposed flames.
text | Destroy You destroy up to 10 gallons of water or a 30-foot cube of fog.
text | Affect an additional 10 gallons per level, or increase the cube by 5 feet per level.
title: Create or Destroy Water

contents: property | Components | VSM (a tiny piece of matter of the type you wish to create)
text | You pull shadow material from Shadowfell to create one object, no larger than a 5' cube, of a form and material you have seen before. Duration depends on material:
text | Attempting to use created material as another spell's material component causes that spell to fail.
text | Cube grows by 5' per level.
title: Creation

contents: text | A creature you touch regains HP equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This has no effect on undead or constructs.
text | Healing increases by 1d8 per level.
title: Cure Wounds

contents: property | Components | VSM (a bit of phosphorous or wychwood, or a glowworm)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | You create up to 4 torch-sized lights within range, formed as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs, or combine all four into one Medium humanoid figure. Each sheds dim light to 10'.
text | Use a bonus action to move the lights up to 60 feet, but the lights must remain within range and within 20' of each other.
title: Dancing Lights

contents: property | Components | VM (bat fur and a drop of pitch or piece of coal)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | A 15' radius sphere of darkness emanates from a point or object you designate within range. Darkvision and nonmagical light cannot pierce it. Completely covering the source of the darkness suppresses the effect.
text | If the effect overlaps an area of light created by a spell 2nd level or lower, the spell that created the light is dispelled.
title: Darkness

contents: property | Components | VSM (a pinch of dried carrot or an agate)
text | Touched willing creature gains darkvision to 60' for the duration.
title: Darkvision

contents: text | Bright light emanates 60', with dim light for an additional 60', from a point or object you designate within range for the duration. Covering the source of the light suppresses the effect.
text | If the effect overlaps an area of darkness created by a spell 3rd level or lower, the spell that created the darkness is dispelled.
title: Daylight

contents: text | The affected creature is protected somewhat against death. The first time the creature would drop to 0 HP, it instead drops to 1 HP and the spell ends. If the target is subject to an effect that would cause instant death without dealing damage, the effect is negated against the target and the spell ends.
title: Death Ward

contents: property | Components | VSM (a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A beam of light condenses to a glowing bead at chosen point. When the spell ends, the bead detonates to a 20-foot radius sphere that spreads around corners. Base is 12d6 fire damage, plus 1d6 per round, Dex save for half.

text | If touched, the creature must make a Dex save. On failure, the spell ends immediately. Otherwise, the creature can throw the bead up to 40 feet, causing it to explode when it hits a creature or solid object.
text | Base damage increases by 1d6 per level.
title: Delayed Blast Fireball

contents: text | You create a shadowy door on a flat solid surface within range, large enough for Medium creatures. The door leads to a demiplane that appears as a 30' cubed room made of wood or stone. When the spell ends the doorway to the demiplane disappears and all creatures, inside and out, remain where they are. Subsequent castings of this spell can connect to the same demiplane or a new one. If you know the nature and contents of a demiplane created by another creature casting this spell, you can connect to that demiplane instead.
title: Demiplane

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | You know if there is an aberration, fiend, fey, celestial, elemental, or undead within 30 feet of you and its location. You also know if a place or object within 30 feet of you has been consecrated or desecrated.
text | The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.
title: Detect Evil & Good

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you. If you sense magic this way, you can use your action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object that bears magic, and you determine the school of magic, if any.
text | The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.
title: Detect Magic

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | For the duration, you can sense the presence, location, and type of poisons, diseases, and poisonous creatures within 30 feet of you.
text | The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.
title: Detect Poison & Disease

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | You are able to read thoughts of creatures within 30 feet. If Int <= 3 or no language, creature is unaffected.
text | When cast and as an action, focus on a creature you can see (or detect one creature you can't see) to read surface thoughts.

text | As an action, you can probe deeper into the creature's reasoning, emotions, and concerns. Creature has a Wis save to prevent and end the spell, and each turn can use an action to make an Int vs Int contest to end the spell.
text | The spell is blocked by 2 feet of rock, 2 inches of common metal, or a thin sheet of lead.
title: Detect Thoughts

contents: text | You teleport yourself to any spot within range: one you can see, one you can visualize, or one described by a distance and direction. You can bring objects up to what you can carry, as well as one willing creature within 5' bearing up to what it can carry.
text | If you would arrive in a place already occupied by an object or creature, take 4d6 force damage and teleport fails.
title: Dimension Door

contents: text | You change your appearance to that of your choosing, so long as it is still humanoid and no more than 1 foot taller or shorter than your natural height. This does not stand up to physical inspection.
text | To discern that you are disguised, a creature must spend an action and succeed on an Investigation check versus your spell save DC.
title: Disguise Self

contents: property | Components | VSM (a lodestone & a pinch of dust)
text | A thin green ray shoots from your finger to a target you can see within range.

text | A creature must succeed on a Dex save or take 10d6+40 force damage. If this reduces it to 0 HP, it is disintegrated: it and all nonmagic items worn or carried turn to fine grey dust. Only true resurrection or wish can restore it.
text | A Large or smaller nonmagical item or creation of magical force is disintegrated. A Huge or larger nonmagical item or creation of magical force has a 10' cube portion disintegrated.
text | Damage increases by 3d6 per level.
title: Disintegrate

contents: property | Components | VSM (holy water or powdered silver and iron)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | Fey, undead, celestials, fiends, and elementals have disadvantage on attack rolls against you.
text | You can touch a creature charmed, frightened, or possessed by one of the above creatures, ending that effect and this spell's effect.

text | You can make a melee spell attack on a creature mentioned above. On a hit the creature must succed a Cha save or be sent to its home plane if it isn't there already. Undead are sent to the Shadowfell, fey are sent to the Feywild. This ends the spell's effect.
title: Dispel Evil & Good

contents: text | Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any spell 3rd level or lower on the target ends. For each spell 4th level or higher on the target, succeed an ability check using your spellcasting ability versus DC 10 + the spells level to end the spell.
text | Automatic success on spells the same level or lower.
title: Dispel Magic

contents: property | Components | VSM (incense and a sacrificial offering, worth 25 gp, which are consumed)

text | You contact a god or a god's servants and can ask a single question pertaining to an activity to occur within the next 7 days and receive a truthful reply, which might be a short phrase, a cryptic rhyme, or an omen..
text | If cast two or more times before completing a long rest, cumulative 25% chance for each casting after the first to get a random reading.
title: Divination

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | Your weapon attacks deal an extra 1d4 radiant damage until the spell ends.
title: Divine Favor

contents: text | Any number of creatures you can see within range are affected depending on their current HP. A Cha save negates these effects:
bullet | <40 HP: deafened and blinded for 10 minutes
bullet | <30 HP: Blinded, deafened, and stunned for 1 hour

text | Regardless of current HP, a celestial, elemental, fey, or fiend failing the save is banished to its plane of origin (if not there already) and can't return to the current plane by any means short of wish for 24 hours.
title: Divine Word

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | Target beast must succeed on a Wis save or be charmed for the duration. It has advantage on the save if you or allies are fighting it. Each time it takes damage, it gets a new Wis save.

text | You can mentally order the beast to take a general course of action which it will do its best to obey. Absent commands, it merely defends itself. You can use your action to take total control until the end of your next turn, specifying movement and actions and using your reaction to have it take its reaction.

text | Duration increases (all require concentration):
5th: 10 minutes. 6th: 1 hour. 7th: 8 hours.
title: Dominate Beast

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | Target creature must succeed on a Wis save or be charmed for the duration. It has advantage on the save if you or allies are fighting it. Each time it takes damage, it gets a new Wis save.

text | You can mentally order the beast to take a general course of action which it will do its best to obey. Absent commands, it merely defends itself. You can use your action to take total control until the end of your next turn, specifying movement and actions and using your reaction to have it take its reaction.
text | 9th: Duration is concentration to 8 hours
title: Dominate Monster

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | Target humanoid must succeed on a Wis save or be charmed for the duration. It has advantage on the save if you or allies are fighting it. Each time it takes damage, it gets a new Wis save.

text | You can mentally order the beast to take a general course of action which it will do its best to obey. Absent commands, it merely defends itself. You can use your action to take total control until the end of your next turn, specifying movement and actions and using your reaction to have it take its reaction.

text | Duration increases (all require concentration):
6th: 10 minutes. 7th: 1 hour. 8th: 8 hours.
title: Dominate Person

contents: property | Components | VSM (a handful of sand, a dab of ink, and a writing quill plucked from a sleeping bird)

text | Target creature known to you on same plane of existence. Creatures that don't sleep cannot be targeted. You, or willing creature you touch, enter trance as messenger, aware of surroundings but unable to move.
text | Messenger appears in target's dreams when target sleeps, can converse as long as sleep and spell last, can shape dream, can end at any time.
text | Can appear terrifying: 10-word message, Wis save or nightmare for 3d6 psychic and no benefit from the sleep. Save at disadvantage if you have a body part, e.g. hair or nail clippings.
title: Dream

contents: text | You create one of the following effects:
bullet | Create a tiny, harmless illusion that predicts the weather for the next 24 hours.
bullet | Instantly make a flower blossom, a seed pod open, or a leaf bud bloom.
bullet | Create a harmless natural sensory effect in a 5' cube.
bullet | Instantly light or snuff a small campfire, torch, or candle.
title: Druidcraft

contents: property | Components | VSM (a pinch of dirt, a piece of rock, and a lump of clay)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A 100-foot radius area around a point within range that you can see tremors and shakes, becoming difficult terrain. Concentrating creatures must make a save. Creatures in the area must succeed on a Dex save when cast at the end of each of your subsequent turns or fall prone.

text | DM options: Fissures (1d6, 1d10Ã—10' deep, 10' wide, Dex save or fall in), Structures collapse (creatures nearby 5d6 bludgeoning, Dex for half, and fail means prone and buried (DC 20 Athletics to escape)).
title: Earthquake

contents: text | Make a ranged spell attack against a creature within range. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 force damage.

text | Multiple attacks on the same or different targets:
2 at 5th, 3 at 11th, 4 at 17th.
title: Eldritch Blast

contents: property | Components | VSM (fur or a feather from a beast)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | The touched creature gains advantage on checks for one ability, plus a related bonus:
bullet | Dex, no damage from falling 20' or less unless incapacitated
bullet | Con, 2d6 temp HP that expire when spell ends
text | Target an additional creature per level.
title: Enhance Ability

contents: property | Components | VSM (a pinch of powdered iron)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | The target is enlarged or reduced by one size category, height doubles/halves (or becomes max for space available), and weight adjusts by a factor of 8 for the duration. An unwilling target gets a Constitution saving throw to resist the effects of this spell. All worn and carried items change size when the spell takes effect too, immediately reverting if dropped.
text | Enlarged Advantage on Str checks and saves, +1d4 damage with enlarged weapons.
text | Reduced Disadvantage on Str checks and saves, âˆ’1d4 damage with reduced weapons, min 1.
title: Enlarge/Reduce

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | Weeds and vines sprout from the ground in a 20-foot radius centered on a point within range, creating difficult terrain. Creatures in the area when you cast the spell must succeed on a Str save or be restrained by the plants until the spell ends. A restrained creature can spend its action to make a Str check versus your spell save DC to break free.
text | Conjured plants wilt away when the spell ends.
title: Entangle

contents: text | Creatures of your choice that you can see within range that can hear you must succeed on a Wis save or be affected. Creatures that can't be charmed automatically succeed, and creatures you or allies are fighting have advantage.
text | Affected creatures have disadvantage on Perception checks to perceive any creature other than you for the duration. Spell ends if you are incapacitated or can no longer speak.
title: Enthrall

contents: text | Enter the Border Ethereal until the spell ends (can dismiss it with an action). While there you can see (60' in shades of grey) and hear the originating plane. Creatures not on the Ethereal Plane cannot perceive or interact with you unless they have the ability to do so. Vertical movement costs 1' per 1'.
text | If you return inside an object or creature, you are shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and take 2 force damage per foot moved.
text | Target up to 3 willing creatures (including you) within 10' per level.
title: Etherealness

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | You can use the Dash action immediately upon casting this spell, and can then use the Dash action as a bonus action each turn for the duration.
title: Expeditious Retreat

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | When cast, and by using your action while the spell lasts, one creature you can see within 60' per turn must succeed on a Wis save or be affected by one of the following (your choice):
bullet | Falls unconscious, can be awoken by damage or another creature using an action to wake it.
bullet | Frightened of you, must use Dash action and move away by safest route if there is anywhere to go. Effect ends when more than 60' away and cannot see you.
bullet | Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks. Wis save at end of each turn to end.
text | A creature that has succeeded on a save against this casting cannot be affected again by it.
title: Eyebite

contents: text | You take raw materials yoiu can see within range and fabricate a Large or smaller object in a 10-foot cube or up to 8 connected 5-foot cubes. If you are working with stone, metal, or some other mineral substance, the fabricated product can be no larger than Medium contained within a single 5' cube. Quality depends on quality of the raw materials.
text | Cannot create or transmute creatures or magic items. Fabricating items with workmanship, including weapons or armor, requires proficiency with relevant artisan's tools.
title: Fabricate

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | Each object in a 20' cube with range is outlined in blue, green, or violet light. Any creature in the area is also outlined if it fails a Dex save. Affected targets emit dim light to 10' and cannot benefit from invisibility. Attackers have advantage versus affected targets they can see.
title: Faerie Fire

contents: property | Components | VSM (a tiny silver whistle, a piece of bone, and a thread)
text | You summon a phantom watchdog in an unoccupied space you can see, where it remains until the spell ends, you dismiss it, or you move more than 100' away.

text | Hound is invisible to all except you and can't be harmed. When a Small or larger creature comes within 30' without speaking the password, the hound starts barking. It sees invisible and ethereal and ignores illusions. At the start of each of your turns, the hound attacks one hostile creature within 5'. To-hit spellcasting modifier + proficiency, 4d8 piercing damage
title: Faithful Hound

contents: property | Components | VSM (a small amount of alcohol or distilled spirits)
text | You gain 1d4+4 temporary hit points for the duration.
text | Gain 5 additional temporary HP per level.
title: False Life

contents: property | Components | VSM (a white feather or the heart of a hen)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | You project a phantasmal image in front of you. Each creature in a 30' cone must succeed on a Wis save or be frightened for the duration.

text | A frightened creature must take the Dash action and move away from you by the safest route on its turn, unless there is nowhere to move. If it ends its turn in a place that does not have line of sight to you, it gets another Wis save against this spell.
title: Fear

contents: property | Casting time | 1 reaction, when you or a creature within 60 feet falls
property | Components | VSM (a small feather or piece of down)

text | Choose up to five falling creatures within range. Affected creatures falling speed becomes 60 feet per round until the spell ends. If the creature lands before the spell ends it takes no falling damage and can land on its feet, ending the spell for that creature.
title: Feather Fall

contents: property | Components | VSM (a handful of clay, crystal, glass, or mineral spheres)

text | The target takes 4d6 psychic damage, and must succeed an Int save or its Intelligence and Charisma scores become 1. Such a creature can no longer cast spells or understand language, nor can it communicate in an intelligible way, but it can still identify friends and act to protect them.
text | Every 30 days, the creature can attempt the saving throw again to end the effect. The effect can also be ended by greater restoration, heal, or wish.
title: Feeblemind

contents: property | Components | VSM (10 gp worth of charcoal, incense, and herbs that must be consumed by fire in a brazier)

text | You summon a familiar in the form of a bat, cat, crab, frog (toad), hawk, lizard, octopus, owl, poisonous snake, fish (quipper), rat, raven, seahorse, spider, or weasel. Only one, casting again merely recalls it and/or changes its form.

text | Has own turn in combat. Obeys your commands. Cannot attack, can use any other action. Vanishes at 0 HP. When within 100', communicate telepathically, use per beast sense, use its reaction to deliver touch spells. Use action to temporarily or permanently dismiss or recall from temporary dismissal to an unoccupied space within 30'.
title: Find Familiar

contents: text | You summon a spirit that assumes the form of an unusually intelligent, strong, and loyal steed in the form of your choosing (warhorse, pony, mastiff, camel, elk, etc.). Is celestial, fey, or fiend (your choice) rather than beast. Min Int 6, understands 1 language you speak. While mounted, a spell you cast that targets only you can also target steed. Vanishes at 0 HP or when dismissed as an action. Communicate telepathically within 1 mile. You have only one steed, recasting merely recalls the existing one.
title: Find Steed

contents: text | You sense the presence and general nature, but not the location, of any trap in range that is within line of sight.

text | For this spell, a "trap" includes anything that would inflict a sudden or unexpected effect you consider harmful or undesirable that was intended by its creator. For example, an alarm spell or pit trap, but not a rotted floor or natural sinkhole.
title: Find Traps

contents: property | Components | VSM (a set of divinatory tools worth 100 gp and an object from the location you wish to find)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 day
text | The spell allows you to find the shortest, most direct route to a specific fixed location on the same plane. The spell fails if the location is non-specific, mobile, or on another plane.

text | As long as the spell lasts and your destination is on the same plane of existence, you know the direction and distance to your destination, and automatically know the shortest and most direct (but not necessarily safest) route at any choice of paths.
title: Find the Path

contents: text | One creature you can see within range takes 7d8+30 necrotic damage, Con save for half.
text | A humanoid killed by this spell is raised at the start of your next turn as a zombie permanently under your control.
title: Finger of Death

contents: text | Make a ranged spell attack. On hit, the target takes 1d10 fire damage. If this strikes an unattended flammable object, it catches on fire.
text | Damage increases to 2d10 at 5th level, 3d10 at 11th, and 4d10 at 17th.
title: Fire Bolt

contents: property | Components | VSM (a bit of phosphorous or a firefly)
text | Flames envelop you, shedding bright light in a 10' radius (and dim for another 10') around you. You can choose a warm shield or chill shield. You can dismiss the spell with an action.
text | A warm shield grants you resistance to cold damage and deals 2d8 fire damage to melee attackers. A chill shield grants fire resistance and deals 2d8 cold damage to melee attackers.
title: Fire Shield

contents: text | A storm of fire consisting of ten face-connected 10' cubes of fire appears, arranged as you wish. Creatures caught in the area take 7d10 fire damage, Dex save for half. Unattended flammable objects are ignited. You can choose if the fire ignites plant life or not.
title: Fire Storm

contents: property | Components | VSM (a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur)

text | Light streaks from your finger to a point within range, then explodes to a 20' radius sphere that spreads around corners. Creatures in area take 8d6 fire damage, Dex save for half. Unattended flammable objects catch fire.
text | Damage increases by 1d6 per level.
title: Fireball

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | A scimitar of fire appears in your hand, shedding bright light in a 10' radius (dim for another 10'). It disappears if dropped, but can be recreated with a bonus action while the spell lasts.
text | You can use your action to make a melee spell attack with the fiery blade for 3d6 fire damage.
text | Damage increases by 1d6 per 2 levels.
title: Flame Blade

contents: property | Components | VSM (a bit of sulfur)
text | A 10' radius, 40' high cylinder of divine fire appears at a point in range, dealing 4d6 fire and 4d6 radiant damage (Dex save for half) to all creatures within its effect.
text | Either the fire or radiant damage (your choice) increases by 1d6 per level.
title: Flame Strike

contents: property | Components | VSM (a bit of tallow, a pinch of brimstone, and a dusting of powdered iron)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A 5' diameter sphere of fire appears in an unoccupied space to choose within range, shedding bright light to 20' and dim for another 20'. Creatures that end their turn within 5' of it take 2d6 fire damage, Dex save for half. Unattended flammable objects are ignited.
text | Use your bonus action to move it up to 30'. It can leap barriers 5' high and gaps 10' wide. Ramming a creature damages it as above and ends the sphere's movement.
text | Damage increases by 1d6 per level.
title: Flaming Sphere

contents: property | Components | VSM (a pinch of lime, water, and earth)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | A creature you can see within range must succeed on a Con save or start to turn into a statue, becoming restrained as its flesh hardens.

text | A restrained creature makes Con saves at the end of each of its turns. 3 successes ends the spell, 3 failures petrifies it for the duration. If the statue is broken, the creature suffers similar deformities if it reverts to flesh.
text | If concentration is maintained for the full minute, petrification is permanent until dispelled.
title: Flesh to Stone

contents: property | Components | VSM (a drop of mercury)

text | You create a 3' wide disk of force floating 3' above the ground that can hold up to 500 pounds. While this is within 20' of you it does not move, but will move to stay within 20' of you if you are traveling. It cannot cross an elevation change of more than 10'. If you move more than 100' away, the spell ends.
title: Floating Disk

contents: property | Components | VSM (a wing feather from any bird)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | Touched willing creature gains a fly speed of 60' for the duration. The creature falls if it is still aloft when the effect ends and it can't prevent itself from falling.
text | Target an additional creature per level.
title: Fly

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour

text | You create a 20' radius cloud of fog centered on a point within range. It spreads around corners and heavily obscures its area. It lasts for the duration or until a moderate wind (at least 10 mph) disperses it.
text | Radius increases by 20' per level.
title: Fog Cloud

contents: property | Components | VSM (a sprinkling of holy water, rare incense, and powdered ruby worth at least 1000 gp)
text | An area of up to 40,000 square feet (30' high) is protected against magical travel, including planar.

text | When casting, choose one or more of elemental, fey, fiend, celestial, and undead and either necrotic or radiant damage. When such a creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it takes 5d10 damage of that type.
text | Areas of forbiddance cannot overlap. If you cast forbiddance every day for 30 days in the same location, the effect becomes permanent and consumes the material components at that time.
title: Forbiddance

contents: property | Components | VSM (ruby dust worth 1500 gp)

text | You create an immobile, invisible cage (up to 20' per side, Â½" bars Â½" apart) or box (up to 10' per side, blocks all matter and spells) of force. Creatures completely inside when cast are trapped, others are pushed out.

text | A creature inside the cage cannot leave by nonmagical means. Teleportation or planar travel requires a Cha save. Being made of force, the cage extends into the Ethereal Plane. dispel magic does not affect the cage.
title: Forcecage

contents: text | You bestow a limited ability to see into the immediate future on a touched willing creature. For the duration, it can't be surprised, has advantage on all attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws, and attack rolls against it have disadvantage.
text | This spell ends if you cast it again before the effect expires.
title: Foresight

contents: property | Components | VSM (a leather strap, bound around the arm or similar appendage)

text | Touch a willing creature. For the duration it is unhampered by difficult terrain, cannot be restrained or paralyzed or have its speed reduced by spells or magical effects, can spend 5 feet of movement to escape nonmagical restraints (including grapples), and has no penalty on movement or attacks for being underwater.
title: Freedom of Movement

contents: property | Components | VSM (a small crystal sphere)

text | A small globe of frozen energy streaks to a point within range and explodes in a 60' radius sphere. Creatures in the area take 10d6 cold damage, Con save for half. Water in the area is frozen up to 6 inches thick for 1 minute. A creature trapped in ice can break free with a Str check vs your spell save DC.

text | You can also save the globe to throw (up to 40') or hurl with a sling (normal sling range) later, or give it to another to do so, or set it down gently. On impact or after 1 minute it explodes.
text | Damage increases by 1d6 per level.
title: Freezing Sphere

contents: property | Components | VSM (a bit of gauze and a wisp of smoke)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | Touch a willing creature to transform it and its possessions into a cloud for the duration. The spell ends at 0 HP and has no effect on incorporeal creatures.

text | The creature's only movement is a flying speed of 10' (hover). It can enter the space of other creatures and pass through small holes and cracks, but treats liquids as solid surfaces. It has resistance to nonmagical damage and advantage on Str, Dex, and Con saves. It cannot talk, manipulate objects, attack, or cast spells, and objects it was carrying cannot be dropped, used, or interacted with.
title: Gaseous Form

text | A creature that you can see within range succeeds a Wis save or is charmed. Advantage if you or allies are fighting it. While charmed it is incapacitated and unaware, and you can verbally modify a 10-minute memory within the past 24 hours: eliminate, recall perfectly, change details, or replace.
text | If it takes damage or is targeted by another spell, this spell ends with no modification. remove curse or greater restoration restores original memory.
text | Longer range. 6th: 7 days. 7th: 30 days. 8th: 1 year. 9th: any memory.
title: Modify Memory

contents: property | Components | VSM (several seeds of any moonseed plant and a piece of opalescent feldspar)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A 5' radius, 40' tall cylinder of silvery (dim) light fills an area within range. When a creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it takes 2d10 radiant damage, with a Con save for half. A shapechanger has disadvantage, and on failure reverts to original form and cannot change while in the light.
text | Use an action to move the beam up to 60'.
text | Damage increases by 1d10 per level.
title: Moonbeam

contents: property | Components | VSM (an iron blade and a small bag of mixed soils)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 2 hours

text | You can reshape dirt, sand, or clay in a 40-square-foot area of terrain: change elevation, make/remove a trench/wall/pillar, height up to half the area's largest dimension. Change takes 10 minutes; you can change areas every 10 minutes. Rocks, stone, structures, and plants cannot be directly affected. Creatures can easily move out of the way.
title: Move Earth

contents: property | Components | VSM (a pinch of diamond dust worth 25 gp sprinkled on target and consumed)

text | For the duration the willing creature you touch cannot be targeted by divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors. This effect can also be placed over an area or object no larger than 10' in any dimension.
title: Nondetection

contents: property | Components | VSM (ashes from a burned leaf of mistletoe and a sprig of spruce)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour

text | For the duration, creatures you choose within 30' including yourself get a +10 bonus on Stealth checks and cannot be tracked by nonmagical means. Affected creatures leave no tracks or other traces of passage.

contents: property | Components | VSM (a pinch of sesame seeds)

text | A passage appears at a point you choose on a wooden, plaster, or stone surface such as a wall, ceiling, or floor. The passage can be up to 5' wide, 8' high, and 20' deep. It creates no instability in the surrounding structure.
text | Any creature inside the passage when the spell expires is safely ejected to a spot nearest to the surface on which the spell was cast.
title: Passwall

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | You tap into the deepest fears of a creature you can see within range and make an illusory manifestation of it, visible only to that creature. The target must succeed on a Wis save or become frightened for the duration. At the end of each turn while the effect is in place, the target must succeed on a Wis save or take 4d10 psychic damage. On a successful save, the spell ends.
text | Damage increases by 1d10 per level.
title: Phantasmal Killer

contents: text | You conjure a Large horselike creature in an unoccupied space within range, that you or another creature of your choosing can ride. It has bit, bridle, and saddle that vanish if more than 10' from the horse. The horse uses the statistics of a riding horse and has a speed of 100' (10 mph, 13 mph at fast pace).
text | When the spell ends, the horse fades giving the rider 1 minute to dismount. The spell ends if you take an action to dismiss it or if the steed takes any damage.
title: Phantom Steed

contents: text | You beseech a god, demon prince, or some other powerful otherworldly entity for aid. It sends a celestial, elemental, or fiend loyal to it to aid you, appearing in an unoccupied space within range. If you know a specific creature's name you can request it, but might not get it.

text | The creature is under no compulsion to behave in any particular way. You can bargain with it, if you have the ability to communicate with it. As a rule of thumb, 100 gp/minute, 1000 gp/hour, 10000 gp/day, but the creature can vary widely if it wishes.
title: Planar Ally

contents: property | Components | VSM (a jewel worth at least 1000 gp, which is consumed)

text | You bind a celestial, elemental, fiend, or fey to your service for the duration. The creature must be present for the entirety of the spellcasting and makes a Cha save to avoid it. If it was summoned by another spell, that spell's duration is extended to match this one's.
text | The creature must follow your instructions to the letter, but may twist words. When the task is complete, it reports to you if on the same plane, or waits where summoned until the spell ends.

text | Duration increases.
7th: 10 days. 8th: 180 days. 9th: a year and a day.
title: Planar Binding

contents: property | Components | VSM (a forked metal rod worth 250 gp attuned to a plane)

text | You and up to 8 willing creatures who link hands are transported to another plane of existence. You can specify a general location to appear nearby. Or if you know the sigil sequence of a teleportation circle, this can take you there.
text | You can use this spell to banish a creature within your reach. Make a melee spell attack, then it makes a Cha save or be transported to a random location on the target plane.
text | Finding the correct metal and frequency for the rod may be an adventure in itself.

contents: property | Casting time | 1 action or 8 hours
text | If cast as an action, choose a spot within range. All plant life within 100' of that spot becomes thick and overgrown and creatures must spend 4 feet of movement to move 1 foot.
text | If cast as 8 hours, you enrich the land within half a mile. The plants within range become enriched for 1 year, yielding twice the normal amount of food when harvested.

contents: text | You target a creature within range that you can see. The creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d12 poison damage.
text | Damage increases to 2d12 at 5th level, 3d12 at 11th, and 4d12 at 17th.

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour

text | A creature within range is transformed into a new form. This new form can have a CR of up to the transformed creature's CR or level. An unwilling creature can make a Wis save to avoid this effect. Shapechangers automatically succeed on the save.

text | The target's game statistics, including mental abilities, are replaced by the new form's. It retains alignment and personality. It reverts at 0 HP, any excess damage carries over. The target's gear melds into the new form and does not benefit it, and it cannot speak, cast spells, or take actions requiring hands or speech.

contents: text | You target one creature you can see within range. If that creature has 100 or fewer HP remaining, it dies instantly. If it has more than 100 HP remaining, this spell has no effect.

contents: text | Up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range regain 2d8 + your spellcasting modifier HP. This spell has no effect on undead and constructs.
text | Healing increases by 1d8 per level.

contents: text | With this spell you can: create a harmless sensory effect; light or snuff a torch, small fire, or candle; clean or soil a small object (1 cubic foot); chill, warm or flavor nonliving material (1 cubic foot for 1 hour); make a color or mark appear on an object or surface for 1 hour; create a trinket or illusion in your hand until the end of your next turn.
text | You can have up to 3 non-instantaneous effects active at once, and can dismiss one as an action.
title: Prestidigitation

contents: text | Each creature in a 60' cone rolls a Dex save and 1d8 to determine effect:

html |
  1. Red: 10d6 fire damage, save for half
  2. Orange: 10d6 acid damage, save for half
  3. Yellow: 10d6 lightning damage, save for half
  4. Green: 10d6 poison damage, save for half
  5. Blue: 10d6 cold damage, save for half
  6. Indigo: restrained, Con save end of each turn, 3 successes ends, 3 failures petrifies
  7. Violet: blinded until next turn, Wis save at start of turn or banished to a plane of DM's choice
  8. Roll again for 2 effects, rerolling any 8s.
title: Prismatic Spray

contents: text | Creates a wall (90' by 30' by 1") or sphere (radius 30') that sheds light for 100'. Spell fails if intersecting a creature. Designated creatures unaffected. Blocks nonmagical ranged attacks until partially destroyed.

text | Within 20', Con save or blinded for 1 minute. Passing through subject to 7 layers with Dex saves to reduce/avoid: 10d6 fire, 10d6 acid, 10d6 electric, 10d6 poison, 10d6 cold, restrained (Con saves per turn, 3 success to escape or 3 fails to be petrified), blinded (Wis save on turn to escape or be banished).
text | Can destroy layer by layer, see text for details, or use rod of cancellation. Immune to antimagic.
title: Prismatic Wall

contents: property | Components | VSM (a think sheet of lead, piece of opaque glass, wad of cotton/cloth, and powdered chrysolite)
text | You make a 5'â€“100' cube with any/all of:
bullet | Sound can't pass through boundary
bullet | Barrier is dark and foggy, preventing vision
bullet | Divination sensors can't enter or appear inside
bullet | Divination can't target creatures inside
bullet | Nothing can teleport in or out
text | Can dismiss with action. Casting on the same spot every day for a year makes it permanent.
text | Maximum size increases by 100' per level.

contents: text | A flame appears in the palm of your hand for the duration, shedding bright light for 10' and dim for another 10'. Disappears if dismissed with an action or cast again.
text | You can attack with the flame, though that ends the spell. Make a ranged spell attack at a creature within 30' for 1d8 fire damage.
text | Damage increases to 2d8 at 5th level, 3d8 at 11th, and 4d8 at 17th.

contents: property | Components | VSM (a bit of fleece and jade dust worth 25 gp)

text | When the condition you specify occurs, the illusion springs to life, performs its programmed function (with sound), then disappears and resets after 10 minutes, ready to be triggered again.
text | Physical interaction or an Intelligence check vs the spell save DC reveals that it's an illusion.

property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 day

text | You create an illusory image of yourself that lasts for the duration. The illusion looks and sounds like you and can appear anywhere within range that you have seen before. The spell ends if it takes damage.

text | Use your action to have it move up to twice your speed, gesture, speak, and behave as you choose. Use a bonus action to switch between seeing and hearing through its senses and your own (being blinded and deafened to your own surroundings while using its senses).
text | Physical interaction or an Intelligence check vs the spell save DC reveals that it's an illusion.

text | You return a creature dead for no more than 10 days to life. If the soul is willing to return to the body, it returns to life with 1 HP. The spell fails if essential body parts (e.g. head, liver) are missing.This spell cannot return undead to life.
text | Creatures brought back this way suffer a -4 penalty to attack rolls, saving throws, and ability checks. This penalty is reduced by 1 every time the creature completes a long rest.

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

contents: property | Components | VSM (1000 gp diamond, which is consumed)

text | You touch a dead creature that has been dead no more than a century that didn't die of old age and isn't undead, and bring it back to life if the soul is free and willing. text | Creatures brought back this way take a -4 penalty on attack rolls, saves, and ability checks, decreasing the penalty by 1 per long rest.

When the spell expires, creatures in the area fall as normal.

contents: property | Components | VSM (diamonds worth 300 gp, which are consumed)

property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | If you have only secondhand knowledge, it gets +5 on the save. If you know the target well, it gets -5. If you have a likeness of the target it gets -2; a garment or possession gets -4; a body part, including hair or nail clippings, gets -10.

After 60 days there is a cumulative 5% chance per day that the spell effect ends. It also ends if you cast this spell again, if the replica is destroyed, or if you choose to end it as an action. If the larger chest is in the Ethereal Plane when this effect ends, it is irretrievably lost.
title: Secret Chest

contents: property | Components | VSM (a pinch of talc and a small sprinkling of silver powder)

text | This can send a message across any distance and even to other planes of existence, but there is a 5% chance it fails if the recipient is on another plane.

contents: property | Components | VSM (diamond dust worth 100 gp, which is consumed)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | The spell turns the flesh of a willing creature you touch as hard as stone. Until the spell ends, the creature has resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage.
title: Stoneskin

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | A storm cloud forms at a point you can see, spreading to a 360' radius. Creatures up to 5000' under the cloud when it appears must succeed on a Con save or take 2d6 thunder damage and be deafened for 5 minutes.

text | Round 2: 1d6 acid damage to creatures & objects
Round 3: Lightning strikes 6 creatures/objects for 10d6 damage, Dex save for half
Round 4: Hail deals 2d6 bludgeoning damage
Rounds 5-10: Strong wind and freezing rain: difficult terrain, heavily obscured, DC10 concentration saves, 1d6 cold damage, prevents ranged weapon attacks, disperse fogs.
title: Storm of Vengeance

contents: property | Components | VM (a snake's tongue and honeycomb or sweet oil)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 8 hours

text | You suggest a course of action and magically influence a creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you. Creatures unable to be charmed are immune. The suggestion must be reasonable; self-harm automatically ends the effect.
text | The target succeeds a Wis save or pursues the action to the best of its ability. If you or allies damage a creature, the spell ends.
title: Suggestion

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | An intense beam of light shines from your hands in a 60' long, 5' wide line. Creatures in the effect take 6d8 radiant damage and are blinded until your next turn, Con save for half and not blinded. Undead and oozes have disadvantage on the save.
text | You can create a new line of radiance as an action on each of your turns until the spell ends.
text | For the duration, a mote of brilliance sheds sunlight from your hand, bright for 30' and dim for another 30'.
title: Sunbeam

contents: property | Components | VSM (fire and a piece of sunstone)

text | Brilliant sunlight flashes in a 60' radius area within range. Creatures within the area take 12d6 radiant damage and are blinded for 1 minute, Con save for half and not blinded. Undead and oozes have disadvantage on the save.
text | A blinded creature can make a Con save at the end of each of its turns to end the condition.
text | This spell dispels any magical darkness in its area.
title: Sunburst

contents: property | Components | VSM (Hg, P, powdered diamond and opal worth 1000 gp, which are consumed)
property | Duration | Until dispelled or triggered
text | Max 10' diameter, 10' movement. Investigation vs spell DC. Triggered: 60' dim light for 10 minutes affects creatures in, entering, ending turn:
bullet | Death: 10d10 necrotic, Con save for half
bullet | Discord: Con save or 1m no communicate and disadvantage on attacks and checks
bullet | Fear: Wis save or 1m frightened, drop held, move 30' away if able
bullet | Hopeless: Cha save or 1m can't do harm
bullet | Insanity: Int save or 1m no act/read/communicate, DM controls movement
bullet | Pain: Con save or 1m incapacitated
bullet | Sleep: Wis save or 10m asleep
bullet | Stunning: Wis save or 1m stunned
title: Symbol

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes
text | You can manipulate creatures or objects within range with your mind. When cast and as an action, affect one object or creature.

text | Creature: Huge or smaller. Make an ability check with your spellcasting ability opposed by the creature's Strength. If you win you can move the creature up to 30' (including up) within range, creature is restrained until the end of your next turn.

text | Object: Up to 1000 pounds. If attended, make an ability check with your spellcasting ability opposed by the creature's Strength. Move up to 30' within range, and can manipulate simple tools, open/close containers, stow/retrieve items, etc.
title: Telekinesis

contents: property | Components | VSM (pieces of eggshell from two different kinds of creatures)

text | You forge a telepathic link among up to 8 willing creatures of your choice within range. For the duration, the targets can communicate telepathically regardless of language over any distance, though not across planes of existence. Creatures with Int 2 or less aren't affected.
title: Telepathic Bond

contents: text | Transport yourself and up to eight willing creatures, or a single object fitting in a 10' cube, to a destination known to you on the same plane. Familiarity determines result (roll d100):

bullet | Tie: Known sigil sequence, or you have an object taken from there in the past 6 months
bullet | Off target: by 1d10Ã—1d10 % of distance
bullet | Mishap: 3d10 force dmg, reroll (may repeat)
title: Teleport

contents: property | Components | VM (rare chalks and inks worth 50 gp, which are consumed)

text | You draw a 10' diameter circle on the ground, inscribed with sigils that link it to a permanent teleportation circle on the same plane whose sigil sequence you know. A portal opens to the destination until the end of your next turn.

text | Many temples, guilds, and important places have permanent circles. When you learn this spell, you also learn the sequences for two locations on the Material Plane. You can memorize a new sequence by studying it for 1 minute.
text | Create a new permanent circle by casting this spell in the same place every day for 1 year. You needn't actually use it to teleport.
title: Teleportation Circle

contents: text | You create one of the following effects:
bullet | your voice booms three times as loud
bullet | you cause flames to flicker and change for 1 minute
bullet | you cause harmless tremors for 1 minute
bullet | you create a harmless sound within range
bullet | you cause an unlocked door or window to fly open
bullet | you alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute
text | You can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at once, and can dismiss such an effect as an action.
title: Thaumaturgy

contents: text | Creatures within a 15' cube of you take 2d8 thunder damage and are pushed 10 feet away. If they make a Constitution saving throw they take half damage and are not pushed. Unsecured objects are also pushed, and the thunder is audible to 300'.
text | Damage increases by 1d8 per level.
title: Thunderwave

contents: text | You briefly stop time for everyone but yourself. You take 1d4+1 turns in a row, during which you can move and take actions as normal.
text | The spell ends if any of the actions you take affect another creature or an object worn by another creature, or if you move more than 1000 feet away from where you cast the spell.
title: Time Stop

contents: property | Components | VSM (a small crystal bead)
text | A 10' radius immobile dome of force appears around and above you. The spell ends if you leave its area.

text | Nine Medium creatures can fit inside the dome with you (the spell fails if it would include more or larger creatures). Creatures and objects within the dome when cast can enter and exit freely, all others are barred. Spells and other magical effects cannot be cast into or through the dome.
text | The atmosphere inside is comfortable and dry regardless of weather. You control the lighting inside. It is opaque (any color) from the outside, transparent from the inside.
title: Tiny Hut

contents: property | Components | VM (a small clay model of a ziggurat)
text | The touched creature gains the ability to understand any language, and any creature that understands at least one language can understand what the target says.
title: Tongues

contents: text | This creates a link between a Large or larger inanimate plant within range and another plant on the same plane of existence. You must have touched the destination plant at least once before. For the duration, creatures can step into the target plant and exit from the destination plant using 5 feet of movement.
title: Transport via Plants

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | You gain the ability to enter a tree and move from inside it to inside another tree of the same type within 500 feet. Both must be living and at least the same size as you.

text | You must use 5' of movement to enter a tree. You instantly know the location of all other trees of the same kind within 500' and use another 5' movement to step to a spot adjacent to the current tree or any destination tree. If you have no movement left, you appear within 5' of the tree you entered.
text | You can use this mode of transportation once per round for the duration, and must end each round outside of a tree.
title: Tree Stride

contents: property | Components | VSM (1 drop of mercury, a dollop of gum arabic, and a wisp of smoke)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour
text | Creature or nonmagical object in range transformed. Unwilling creature Wis save to avoid. Shapechangers unaffected. Gear melds into new form. Permanent if lasts the full hour.

text | Creature to creature: CR <= target's level or CR. Game statistics, including mental abilities, replaced by new form's. Retains alignment and personality. Reverts at 0 HP, excess damage carries over. Cannot speak, cast spells, or take actions requiring hands or speech.
Object to creature: CR <= 9, same size or smaller. Friendly and you control it, until permanent.
Creature to object: No memory of time spent.
title: True Polymorph

contents: property | Components | VSM (a sprinkle of holy water and diamonds worth 25000 gp, which are consumed)

text | You touch a creature that has been dead for no longer than 200 years and that died of something other than old age. If the soul is free and willing, creature is restored to life with full HP. The spell closes all wounds, cures all diseases, lifts curses, and replaces missing body parts.
text | The spell can provide a new body if the old one is not available, in which case you must speak the creature's name to perform the spell and it appears in an unoccupied space within 10'.
title: True Resurrection

contents: property | Components | VSM (an ointment for the eyes that costs 25 gp, made of mushroom powder, saffron, and fat, which is consumed)
text | For the duration, a willing creature you touched has truesight, notices secret doors hidden by magic, and can see into the Ethereal Plane, all out to a range of 120 feet.
title: True Seeing

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 round
text | On your next turn, you have advantage on the first attack roll you make against the target creature if the spell hasn't ended.
title: True Strike

contents: property | Components | VSM (a piece of string and a bit of wood)

text | An invisible, mindless, shapeless force appears and follows your commands until the spell ends. It has AC 10, 1 HP, Str 2, and can't attack. The spell ends if it drops to 0 HP or moves more than 60' from you.

text | As a bonus action, you can mentally command it to move up to 15' and interact with an object. It can do simple tasks a human servant could do, such as fetching things, cleaning, mending, folding clothes, lighting fires, serving food, pouring wine. The servant performs the task to the best of its ability, then awaits your next command.
title: Unseen Servant

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | Make a melee spell attack against a creature in your reach. On a hit, the target takes 3d6 necrotic damage and you regain half that much HP.
text | Until the spell ends, you can use your action to make the attack again.
text | Damage increases by 1d6 per level.
title: Vampiric Touch

contents: text | A creature you can see within range that can hear you (it need not understand you) must succeed on a Wis save or take 1d4 psychic damage and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.
text | Damage increases to 2d4 at 5th level, 3d4 at 11th, and 4d4 at 17th.
title: Vicious Mockery

contents: property | Components | VSM (a small piece of phosphorous)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | An opaque wall (up to 60' long) or ring (up to 20' diameter) of fire, 20' high and 1' thick, appears on a solid surface within range. Each creature in the wall takes 5d8 fire damage, Dex save for half.

text | When a creature enters the wall for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there, it takes 5d8 fire damage. The same happens if a creature ends its turn within 10' of the wall on a side chosen when the spell is cast.
text | Damage increases by 1d8 per level.
title: Wall of Fire

contents: property | Components | VSM (powder from a crushed clear gem)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | An invisible wall of force appears within range. It can be oriented in any direction. It can be a sphere or hemisphere 10' in radius, or a flat surface made of ten contiguous 10' square panels. In any form, it is Â¼" thick. If the wall cuts through a creature's space, it is pushed to a side of your choice.
text | Nothing can pass through the wall. It is immune to all damage and to dispel magic, but can be destroyed by disintegrate The wall extends into the Ethereal Plane.
title: Wall of Force

contents: property | Components | VSM (a small piece of quartz)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | A wall of ice appears on a solid surface within range: a sphere or hemisphere 10' in radius, or a flat surface made of ten contiguous 10' square panels. In any form, it is 1' thick. If the wall forms in a creature's space, it is pushed aside and takes 10d6 cold damage, Dex save for half.

text | The wall is an object and can be damaged. AC 12, 30 HP per 10' section, vulnerable to fire damage. Destroying a section leaves frigid air, dealing 5d6 cold damage (Con save for half) to a creature moving through it for the first time on a turn.
text | Per level, initial damage increases by 2d6 and frigid air damage increases by 1d6.
title: Wall of Ice

contents: property | Components | VSM (a small block of granite)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | Create a nonmagical wall of stone made of 10 contiguous panels, each 10'Ã—10'x6" or 10'Ã—20'x3". If the wall appears in a creature's space, it is pushed to a side of your choice. If a creature would be boxed in, Dex save to use reaction to move up to its speed. Wall can have any shape and need not be vertical or rest on a firm foundation, but must merge with and be solidly supported by existing stone. If a span > 20', halve the size of each panel to create supports. Each panel has AC 15 and 30 HP per inch of thickness.
text | If you maintain concentration for the full 10 minutes the wall is permanent, otherwise it disappears when the spell ends.
title: Wall of Stone

contents: property | Components | VSM (a handful of thorns)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 10 minutes

text | You create an opaque wall (up to 60' long, 10' high) or ring (up to 20' diameter, 20' high) of tangled, thick thorny brush 5' thick. Creatures in the wall when it forms take 7d8 piercing damage, Dex save for half. A creature can push through the wall, spending 4 feet per 1 foot, and taking 7d8 slashing damage (Dex save for half) when entering for the first time on a turn or ending its turn there.
text | Both damages increase by 1d8 per level.
title: Wall of Thorns

contents: property | Components | VSM (A pair of platinum rings worth 50 gp, which you and target must wear)

text | You touch a willing creature and create a connection between you. While the spell lasts, the creature has +1 bonus to AC and to all saving throws, and has resistance to all damage. Whenever the creature takes damage, you take the same amount of damage.
text | The spell ends if you drop to 0 HP, if you and the target become separated by more than 60', if you cast the spell again, or if you dismiss the spell as an action.
title: Warding Bond

contents: property | Components | VSM (a short reed or piece of straw)

text | This spell grants up to ten willing creatures you can see within range the ability to breath underwater until the spell ends. All affected creatures also retain their normal mode of respiration.
title: Water Breathing

contents: property | Components | VSM ( a piece of cork)

text | This spell grants up to 10 willing creatures you can see within range the ability to walk on water, acid, mud, snow, quicksand, or lava as if it were a solid surface, though those walking on lava still take damage from the heat. If an affected creature is submerged, they float toward the surface at a rate of 60 feet per round.
title: Water Walk

contents: property | Components | VSM (a bit of spiderweb)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour

text | You conjure a 20' cube of webbing at a spot within range. The webs are difficult terrain and lightly obscure the area. If the web is not anchored between two points or layered on a floor, wall, or ceiling, it collapses in on itself and ends at the start of your next turn. Layered webs have a depth of 5'. The webs are flammable: a 5' cube burns in 1 round, dealing 2d4 fire damage to any creature starting its turn inside.

text | Any creature that enters or ends its turn in the web must succeed on a Dex save or be restrained either for the duration or until it breaks free. Restrained creatures make a Str check vs the spell save DC to break free of the web.
title: Web

contents: property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute

text | Each creature in a 30' radius sphere centered on a spot you choose within range must succeed on a Wis save or be frightened for the duration. At the end of each turn, an affected creature makes a Wis save, taking 4d10 psychic damage on failure or ending the effect on success.
title: Weird

contents: property | Components | VSM (fire and holy water)

text | You and up to 10 willing creatures you can see within range are turned into gaseous forms for the duration. While in this form creatures have a fly speed of 300' and resistance to damage from nonmagical weapons. The only actions while gaseous are Dash or revert to normal, which takes 1 minute during which the creature is incapacitated and cannot move. Until the spell ends the creature can become gaseous again, which requires another 1-minute transformation.
text | If in cloud form when the spell ends, the creature descends at 60' per round for 1 minute (landing safely if applicable), then falls normally.
title: Wind Walk

contents: property | Components | VSM (a tiny fan and a feather)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 minute
text | A wall of wind, up to 50' long, 15' tall, and 1' thick, rises from the ground from a point within range. You can shape it in any manner as long as it makes a continuous path.

text | Creatures in the wall's path when it appears take 3d8 bludgeoning damage, Str save for half. The wind wall keeps fog, smoke, and other gasses at bay. Small or smaller flying creatures or objects cannot pass through. Arrows, bolts, and other ordinary projectiles are blown off course and automatically miss.
title: Wind Wall

contents: text | You can use this to create any spell effect of 8th level or lower; create a nonmagical object worth up to 25000 gp; up to 20 creatures are fully healed; up to 10 creatures get resistance to one damage type; up to 10 creatures get immunity to a single spell effect for 8 hours; or undo (reroll) a single recent event. Other effects at DM discression.

text | Producing an effect other than duplicating another spell takes a massive toll on the caster. Each spell you cast before a long rest deals 1d10 necrotic damage per level to you. Your Strength score also drops to 3 for 2d4 days. Finally, there is a 33% chance you can never cast this spell again.
title: Wish

contents: text | You and up to five willing creatures within 5' of you are instantly teleported to a previously designated sanctuary. The spell has no effect if no sanctuary has been designated.
text | You designate a sanctuary by casting this spell in a location strongly linked to your deity. If you attempt this in a location not strongly linked, it has no effect.
title: Word of Recall

contents: text | You create a 15' radius area that guards against deception. When a creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a Cha save. If it fails, it cannot speak a deliberate lie while in the radius. You know whether it succeeded or failed on the save.
text | An affected creature is aware of the spell and can thus refuse to answer or make evasive answers.
title: Zone of Truth
